name: Mario Pinball Land (Wii U)
description:
The funfair has arrived, and one particular attraction is making news
around the Mushroom Kingdom. The Spherifier can transform anyone into a
ball and shoot them out of a cannon. But as Princess Peach steps up for
her turn, it becomes a ride of horrors when scheming Goombas aim her
right at Bowser's doorstep. It's Mario to the rescue!

Roll, ricochet, and cannonball Mario through five different worlds as he
slams into enemies and his surroundings. Complete challenges to obtain
stars, and open up new paths to explore. At the end of the road, you'll
have to face the one and only Bowser! If you want an even bigger
challenge, try and collect all of the stars!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
